text: Pedro Paulo Soares Pereira (Born in April 22, 1970), better known by his stage name Mano Brown, is a Brazilian singer and songwriter. He is the founder of the musical group Racionais MC's, the group was formed in 1988, and integrated by Ice Blue (Paulo Eduardo Salvador), Edi Rock (Edivaldo Pereira Alves) and KL Jay (Kleber Geraldo Lelis Simões). == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian singer-songwriters Category:Singers from São Paulo
title: Mano Brown
